renamed.note: "Update a provisioned organization membership" renamed to "Replace a provisioned user's information"

examples.data: {"groups":[{"group_id":"123","group_name":"Octocat admins","group_description":"The people who configure your octoworld."}]}

renamed.note: The path for "Create or update IdP group connections" changed  from "/teams/{team_id}*" to "/orgs/{org}/teams/{team_slug}*"). The operation ID for the old path now has a "-legacy" suffix. The route with the new path has a "-for-org" suffix in the operation ID to avoid breaking changes

renamed.note: The path for "List IdP groups for a team" changed  from "/teams/{team_id}*" to "/orgs/{org}/teams/{team_slug}*"). The operation ID for the old path now has a "-legacy" suffix. The route with the new path has a "-for-org" suffix in the operation ID to avoid breaking changes
